meanings.definition: The quality or state of being arrogant or snobbish.
meanings.sent1: Her uppitiness was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His uppitiness made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her uppitiness, she couldn't resist joining in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The uppitiness of the queen bee was unmatched in the hive.
meanings.sent5: The uppitiness of the cat as it walked by was unmistakable.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude that is haughty or conceited.
meanings.sent1: The uppitiness of his remarks offended many at the party.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his constant display of uppitiness.
meanings.sent3: His uppitiness was so extreme, it almost seemed like a parody.
meanings.sent4: The uppitiness in her tone was like a sharp slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The uppitiness of the peacock as it strutted around was comical.
